data.text:
Brand New GULF Tokheim 39 Reproduction Gas Pump

This gas pump is a work of art and an amazing piece of Americana. Made in the USA and constructed from the original drawings, this gas pump is perfect! The fit and finish and attention to detail makes it the finest reproduction pump on the market.

The manufacturing is the best in the business. The pump is constructed of rolled steel, high quality powder coated finish, screened and powder coated meter face, porcelain signs, glass sight-glass, machined aluminum accents, vintage nozzle and all metal base. The pump is lit with LED lighting that illuminates the globe, ad glass and meter faces on both sides. The top of the pump is highlighted by a beautiful PERGL gas pump globe.

Dimensions: Total Height including Globe 6' 3"/ Width 22" / Depth 18"/ Weight 150 lbs.

This pump is perfect for any fan of the good ole days! It’s a great addition to any garage, game room, man cave, restaurant, pub, diner or barbershop!

The pump is delivered fully assembled except for the globe that is attached with 3 screws. The pumps are delivered on a skid. 2 pumps can fit on one skid. Pricing does not include shipping. We can provide shipping quotes with following information:

Business or Residential Delivery?

Loading Dock or Liftgate Delivery?
